title: Conglomerate 451 – v1.5.0
body:
Conglomerate 451 – v1.5.0


Genres/Tags: RPG, Dungeon crawl, First-person, 3D, Cyberpunk, Turn-based
Companies: RuneHeads, 1C Entertainment
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI8
Original Size: 4.2 GB
Repack Size: 2.1 GB

  • RuTor [magnet]

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Conglomerate.451.v1.5.0-CODEX ISO release: codex-conglomerate.451.v1.5.0.iso (4,505,501,696 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 4.2 to 2.1 GB)
  • Installation takes 3-5 minutes
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 8 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Conglomerate 451 is a grid-based, dungeon crawling first-person RPG with roguelike elements set in a cyberpunk world.

You are the CEO of a Special Agency, instructed by the Senate of Conglomerate city to restore the order in sector 451, where corrupted corporations have established their turfs. Thanks to the last constitutional decree, you are allowed to create human clones. Build your own team, manipulate DNA, train your agents, equip them with high-end weapons, choose what cyberlimbs to implant, and send the squad to the field with only one goal: eradicate crime and restore order at any cost.

Backwards Compatibility

This repack is NOT backwards compatible with previous C451 repack.
